If you are already doing some shopping online, why not leverage it to do something good?
Yad Arazim is an Israeli NGO which support IDF soldiers via various projects.

Do your shopping on the biggest shopping sites through our affiliate link and a percent of what you already pay will go to the IDF soldiers!

We currently support buying products on Aliexpress, Ebay and Amazon, but will add some more stores in the future.
